Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Title: Shilpa Rao: I don’t think I have worked one day in life
Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.

Description: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are at the Red Sea Film Festival to represent Bollywood in Jeddah. See their photos here.

Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Title: Priyanka Chopra, Kareena, Sonam and Saif dazzle at Red Sea Film Fest day 2: Pics
Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Title: Sharon Stone gasps, screams ‘oh my God’ as she spots Shah Rukh Khan next to her
Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.

Title: Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan are Bollywood royalty at Red Sea Film Fest: Pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are at the Red Sea Film Festival to represent Bollywood in Jeddah. See their photos here.

Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Title: Priyanka Chopra, Kareena, Sonam and Saif dazzle at Red Sea Film Fest day 2: Pics
Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Title: Sharon Stone gasps, screams ‘oh my God’ as she spots Shah Rukh Khan next to her
Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.

Title: Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan are Bollywood royalty at Red Sea Film Fest: Pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are at the Red Sea Film Festival to represent Bollywood in Jeddah. See their photos here.

Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Title: Shilpa Rao: I don’t think I have worked one day in life
Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Title: Shilpa Rao: I don’t think I have worked one day in life
Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.

Description: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are at the Red Sea Film Festival to represent Bollywood in Jeddah. See their photos here.

Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Title: Priyanka Chopra, Kareena, Sonam and Saif dazzle at Red Sea Film Fest day 2: Pics
Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Title: Sharon Stone gasps, screams ‘oh my God’ as she spots Shah Rukh Khan next to her
Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.

Title: Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan are Bollywood royalty at Red Sea Film Fest: Pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are at the Red Sea Film Festival to represent Bollywood in Jeddah. See their photos here.

Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Title: Priyanka Chopra, Kareena, Sonam and Saif dazzle at Red Sea Film Fest day 2: Pics
Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Title: Sharon Stone gasps, screams ‘oh my God’ as she spots Shah Rukh Khan next to her
Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.

Title: Kareena Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan are Bollywood royalty at Red Sea Film Fest: Pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan are at the Red Sea Film Festival to represent Bollywood in Jeddah. See their photos here.

Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Title: Shilpa Rao: I don’t think I have worked one day in life
Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Akash Dahiya: Stars are struggling because OTT platforms has introduced some great talent
Description: Actor Akash Dahiya, who was recently seen in Delhi Crime 2, is happy about the changes that have come in the entertainment industry with the advent of OTT

Title: Shilpa Rao: I don’t think I have worked one day in life
Description: Singer Shilpa Rao talks about re-recording songs till she feels satisfied and working hard to reach where she has reached today.

Title: Kartik Aaryan recalls films got scrapped after he told people about them
Description: Kartik Aaryan recalled that his films got scrapped after he told people about them. Here's what he realised after that. Kartik features in Freddy alongside Alaya F.

Title: Suniel Shetty on whether he felt insecure seeing Akshay Kumar's success
Description: Suniel Shetty spoke about Akshay Kumar's success and whether he felt insecure about the track that his career took.

Title: Karan Johar would like Ranveer Singh to play him in a biopic
Description: Director Karan Johar revealed that actor Ranveer Singh would be the ideal candidate to play him if a feature film on his life was ever made.

Title: Step inside Debina Bonnerjee-Gurmeet Choudhary's new home with huge drawing room
Description: Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary's new home in Mumbai has a huge drawing room. Check out pictures of their house.

Title: Will Smith makes first red carpet appearance with full family post Oscars slap
Description: The actor attended the Los Angeles premiere of his new film Emancipation, with his wife Jada Pinkett Smith and their children.

Title: Kareena Kapoor teases Saif Ali Khan on flight, 'won't stop' clicking his pics
Description: Kareena Kapoor was stopped by her husband Saif Ali Khan from clicking his picture. She has said that she ‘can’t stop, won't stop'. See her post here.

Title: Paresh Rawal clarifies, apologises for his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark
Description: Paresh Rawal has clarified his 'cook fish for Bengalis' remark and also apologised for hurting sentiments. The actor shared his statement in a tweet. Here's what he said.

Title: Shah Rukh Khan reveals details about Dunki: ‘In English it would be Donkey’
Description: Shah Rukh Khan spoke about the title of his upcoming film Dunki, and explained how it actually meant donkey. Here's what the actor said about his first Rajkumar Hirani film.

Title: Rohit Shetty at Cirkus trailer launch: ‘I don’t have a team, I have a family’
Description: Director Rohit Shetty presented the trailer of his upcoming comedy Cirkus with a large ensemble cast including main leads Ranveer Singh, Pooja Hegde, Jacqueline Fernandez and Varun Sharma.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp Quantumania surprise first clip out at Brazil Comic Con
Description: Paul Rudd introduced the exclusive opening clip at the Brazil Comic Con. The opening minutes have not been released online and were just screened for the audience attending the event in person. Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania releases in theaters on February 17, 2023.

Title: Veteran Odia film actor Jharana Das dies at 77, President Murmu remembers her
Description: Veteran actor Jharana Das died at the age of 77. She was known for films such as Shree Jagannath, Nari, Adinamegha, Hisabnikas, Pujafula, Amadabata, Abhinetri, Malajanha and Heera Nella.

Title: Ayushmann Khurrana thanks Akshay Kumar for his cameo in An Action Hero
Description: Ayushmann Khurrana shared a thank you post for Akshay Kumar for his presence in his latest film, An Action Hero. He called Akshay ‘the OG Khiladi.’ The film released in theatres on December 2.

Title: As Shah Rukh Khan receives award, Priyanka Chopra claps for him. Watch
Description: Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra were spotted at the opening day of the Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah on Thursday.

Title: Kajol roars with laughter at hilarious Ajay Devgn impression on TKSS
Description: The upcoming weekend episode of The Kapil Sharma Show will have Kajol, Vishal N. Jethwa and Revathy Asha Kelunni over to promote their film Salaam Venky. Kajol laughed at Ajay Devgn's mimicry on the show.

Title: Hansika Motwani glows with fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on Sufi night before wedding
Description: Actor Hansika Motwani is due to marry fiancé Sohael Kathuriya on December 4 at the Mundota Fort and Palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.

Title: Anand Gandhi says Kantara celebrates ‘toxic masculinity’, is not like Tumbbad
Description: Filmmaker Anand Gandhi has finally watched the Kannada film Kantara and doesn't seem to be a big fan. He took to Twitter to share his opinion of the movie.

Title: Jaideep Ahlawat says he'd do bad films for good money
Description: Jaideep Ahlawat has said that he may take up a bad film if the money is good enough, adding that he may not continue doing so for long as he'd like to balance good films and the ones that pay well.

Title: An Action Hero box office: Ayushmann Khurrana off to a ‘very dull’ start
Description: An Action Hero box office day 1 collection: Ayushmann Khurrana's latest thriller got positive reviews but they have not translated into traffic at ticket windows.

Title: Ashneer Grover says ‘only failed individuals’ go on Bigg Boss
Description: Shark Tank judge Ashneer Grover has said that he was offered a chance to participate in Bigg Boss, but he rejected it. He has said that he may consider participating if he is offered money more than host Salman Khan.

Title: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha gets customised quilt as special gift
Description: Alia Bhatt took to Instagram and shared her daughter Raha's customised gift. Raha got a cute handcrafted quilt for herself as her special gift.

Title: Salman Khan scolds Archana Gautam: What do you think of yourself
Description: Bigg Boss 16: On Saturday's episode of the reality show, Salman Khan will be seen scolding Archana Gautam. Most of the housemates will also be seen naming Shalin Bhanot for eviction.

Title: SS Rajamouli nabs Best Director for RRR at New York Film Critics Circle
Description: SS Rajamouli has registered the first major win for his film RRR. The filmmaker was awarded Best Director at New York Film Critics Circle.

Title: Priyanka Chopra, Kareena, Sonam and Saif dazzle at Red Sea Film Fest day 2: Pics
Description: Priyanka Chopra. Sonam Kapoor, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were all at the Red Sea Film Festival on Friday.

Title: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan’s special is an oddly rewarding watch
Description: Tathastu review: Zakir Khan's comedy special could have used more punchlines but the comedian's life journey is still a treat to listen to.

Title: Rithvik Dhanjani: Many parents think their kids don’t belong to them anymore
Description: Rithvik Dhanjani talks to Hindustan Times about hosting a new dating reality show DateBaazi. The show is unique since parents of single people get to choose a date for them without consulting them about the same.

Title: Sharon Stone gasps, screams ‘oh my God’ as she spots Shah Rukh Khan next to her
Description: Shah Rukh Khan was at the Red Sea Film Festival on Thursday and even Sharon Stone couldn't help but gasp at the sight of him.
